name: Wikipedia "Hitchhiker"
description: A dark version of Wikipedia.org :) Hope you like it. Enjoy! Thanks to Plathix for the idea :D Also check out these dark themes :) Facebook "HitchHiker" Userstyles "HitchHiker" Youtube "HitchHiker" ZippyShare "HitchHiker" Greasy Fork "HitchHiker" Wikipedia Fork "HitchHiker" FEEL FREE TO SEND IDEAS, SUGGESTIONS AND QUESTIONS TO -> hitchhikerstyle@gmail.com Please comment and give feedback if you like this Style :) it would help me a lot in terms of motivation. Thanks!
